Package src.pkg_game

Class GameEngine

java.lang.Object
src.pkg_game.GameEngine
public class GameEngine extends Object
This class represents the core engine of the game, responsible for managing game elements such as rooms, items, and characters. It processes player commands and controls the flow of the game.
Author:
Pierre MATAR

    • interpretCommand

      public void interpretCommand(String pCommandLine)
      Interprets and executes a given command line string. If the command ends the game, the game terminates.
      Parameters:
      pCommandLine - The command line string entered by the player.

      private void invokeQuitCommand(boolean pShouldRestart)
      Allow to quit the game.
      Parameters:
      false - to quit immediately, true to ask to restart the game.
